EmailTemplate.name: SGP_BRD_16_Jameson evoucher campaign.Email - Confirmation (Burger)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Gift from Jameson
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Trouble experiencing our offer? View in web browser. <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>
Congratulations!
This voucher entitles you to a FREE BURGER at MEATliquor
Please click on the button below for the outlet attendant to validate your voucher. Enjoy!
<[[{{my.coupon_link}}]]>
This e-voucher is valid strictly for Meat Liquor Singapore, to any one of the 'Signature Burgers' on the menu only. Not to be exchanged for other meals. The offer may be redeemed up until November 30th 2016. After that, the e-coupon is no longer valid. Customers must be over the age of 18 to avail of this promotion.
Redemption is valid until 30th November 2016
